sidenavShortDescription.other:
Hi 👋, my name is {{.Site.Params.ownerfirstname}} and I'm a Software Developer.
Welcome to my website!

homeAboutShortDescription.other: I'm a Software Developer that loves building scalable quality software and experimenting with different new (and old) technologies.

homeAboutCheckMyBlog.other: I sometimes write on my blog about topics that I find interesting, usually technical matters or just a solution to a problem that I encountered in my daily programming routine

homeAboutHowMayIHelp.other: Want to know how I may help with your future project?

homeAboutCheckMyLinks.other: Check out my project portfolio and online resume.

homeWhatDescriptionIntroText.other: I have more than 10 years' experience building software for clients all over the world.

homeWhatDescriptionIntroMainSkillsText.other: Below is a quick overview of my main technical skill sets and technologies I use.

homeWhatDescriptionCheckText.other: Want to find out more about my experience? Check out my online resume and project portfolio.
